name: Echoes of Consciousness
description:
THE GAME:

You find yourself in an empty village, not knowing what happened to you or the village.  

You find yourself having reality bending powers. The origin of which is a mystery to be solved.

A mysterious figure is looming around and telling you more about your origin but speaking in riddles. It seems he may know more about you and the world around than you do yourself

As you approach a mysterious abandoned mansion, you find yourself having to solve the inner workings of the mansion. Solving  puzzles will lead you to unlocking previously locked parts of the mansion. With truth lying somewhere within...

HOW TO PLAY:

Download and extract the zip

Open the folder and double click the file "Echoes of consiosness"

Enjoy!
